1 pound red potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes,1 cup baby lima beans,1 (5.3 ounce) container plain Greek yogurt,,2 tablespoons white wine vinegar,1 tablespoon Dijon mustard,1/2 teaspoon salt,1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper,1 (15 1/2 ounce) can cannellini beans, rinsed and drained,1/2 cup fresh dill,1/2 small red onion, thinly sliced and halved,1/3 cup kalamata olives,1 rib celery,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,6 cups omaine lettuce,,
